    ENOCENT = v5,

    MARRIED = v10,
    MIDATL = v11,
    MT = v12,
    NEWENG = v13,
    CENSUS = v16,
    QOB = v18,
    RACE = v19,
    SMSA = v20,
    SOATL = v21,
    WNOCENT = v24,
    WSOCENT = v25,
    YOB = v27
    )
head(qob_new)
